# init(_:_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a publisher created by applying the merge function to two upstream publishers.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ a: A, _ b: B)
```

## Parameters

- **a**: A publisher to merge
- **b**: A second publisher to merge.
title: init(_:_:)
